descriptions:
Introducing our delightful Squirrel House/Nesting Box, a perfect outdoor abode for your furry friends! Meticulously crafted from durable cedar wood, this charming nesting box is both glued and nailed for optimal strength and longevity.

Adorning one of its walls is a captivating burned image of a squirrel, skillfully created by artist Drew Senesac. This unique feature not only adds an artistic touch but also makes the squirrel house stand out in your garden.

The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring your little guests have a tidy and comfortable home. Moreover, the package includes two screws and washers, making the mounting process a breeze.

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches and inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches, this squirrel house provides ample space for nesting. The squirrel opening measures 3.5 inches in diameter, just the right size for your squirrels to enter and exit comfortably.

Treat your garden squirrels to a cozy home with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order now and bring a touch of nature's charm to your outdoor space!
